## Basic Info.

-   Name: 헤리퍼드 마파문디 [Hereford Mappa Mundi](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hereford_Mappa_Mundi)

-   Who: Unclear, maybe 리차드 더 벨로(Richard de Bello)

-   When: 1245-1326 [@brotton2014b, 57]

-   Where: [Hereford Cathedral](https://www.herefordcathedral.org/), Hereford, U.K.

-   Size: 1.58 x 1.33 m [@brotton2014b, 57]

![<https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Hereford-Karte.jpg>](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/4/48/Hereford-Karte.jpg/1761px-Hereford-Karte.jpg)
